81-year-old.context: This is an 81-year-old gentleman who underwent septorhinoplasty many years ago.

squamous cell carcinoma.context: A diagnosis of diffuse invasive squamous cell carcinoma was rendered.

tenderness.context: He has been complaining of tenderness and induration of his nasal tip for approximately two years and has been treated unsuccessfully for folliculitis and cellulitis of the nasal tip.

induration.context: He has been complaining of tenderness and induration of his nasal tip for approximately two years and has been treated unsuccessfully for folliculitis and cellulitis of the nasal tip.

folliculitis.context: He has been complaining of tenderness and induration of his nasal tip for approximately two years and has been treated unsuccessfully for folliculitis and cellulitis of the nasal tip.

cellulitis.context: He has been complaining of tenderness and induration of his nasal tip for approximately two years and has been treated unsuccessfully for folliculitis and cellulitis of the nasal tip.

erythema.context: The preoperative examination shows induration of the nasal tip without significant erythema.

focal tenderness.context: There is focal tenderness just cephalad to the alar crease.

lesion.context: There is no lesion either externally or intranasally.

asymmetry.context: There was slight asymmetry of the nares.

biopsy.context: Random biopsies of the submucosal tissue were taken and submitted to pathology for frozen section.

alar incision.context: An alar incision was made with a #15 blade and the full-thickness incision was completed with the electrocautery.

margins.context: Additional soft tissue was then taken from all margins tagging them for the pathologist.

disease.context: there was still disease present in the region of the upper lateral cartilage at its insertion with the nasal bone.

Xeroform gauze.context: Xeroform gauze was then fashioned to cover the defect and was sutured along the periphery of the wound with interrupted 6-0 nylon suture to provide a barrier and moisture.

sutured.context: Xeroform gauze was then fashioned to cover the defect and was sutured along the periphery of the wound with interrupted 6-0 nylon suture to provide a barrier and moisture.
